feed.title: Zitnik Lab
feed.subtitle: Harvard Machine Learning for Medicine and Science

entry.title: Biomedical AI Agents
entry.content: We envision ‘AI scientists’ as systems capable of skeptical learning and reasoning that empower biomedical research through collaborative agents that integrate machine learning tools with experimental platforms.
entry.summary: We envision ‘AI scientists’ as systems capable of skeptical learning and reasoning that empower biomedical research through collaborative agents that integrate machine learning tools with experimental platforms.

entry.title: Efficient ML Seminar Series
entry.content: We started a Harvard University Efficient ML Seminar Series. Congrats to Jonathan for spearheading this initiative. Harvard Magazine covered the first meeting focusing on LLMs.
entry.summary: We started a Harvard University Efficient ML Seminar Series. Congrats to Jonathan for spearheading this initiative. Harvard Magazine covered the first meeting focusing on LLMs.

entry.title: UniTS - Unified Time Series Model
entry.content: UniTS is a unified time series model that can process classification, forecasting, anomaly detection and imputation tasks within a single model with no task-specific modules. UniTS has zero-shot, few-shot, and prompt learning capabilities. Project website.
entry.summary: UniTS is a unified time series model that can process classification, forecasting, anomaly detection and imputation tasks within a single model with no task-specific modules. UniTS has zero-shot, few-shot, and prompt learning capabilities. Project website.

entry.title: Weintraub Graduate Student Award
entry.content: Michelle receives the 2024 Harold M. Weintraub Graduate Student Award. The award recognizes exceptional achievement in graduate studies in biological sciences. News Story. Congratulations!
entry.summary: Michelle receives the 2024 Harold M. Weintraub Graduate Student Award. The award recognizes exceptional achievement in graduate studies in biological sciences. News Story. Congratulations!

entry.title: PocketGen - Generating Full-Atom Ligand-Binding Protein Pockets

link.title: PocketGen - Generating Full-Atom Ligand-Binding Protein Pockets

entry.content: PocketGen is a deep generative model that generates residue sequence and full-atom structure of protein pockets, maximizing binding to ligands. Project website.
entry.summary: PocketGen is a deep generative model that generates residue sequence and full-atom structure of protein pockets, maximizing binding to ligands. Project website.

entry.title: SPECTRA - Generalizability of Molecular AI
entry.content: SPECTRA is an approach for holistic evaluation of how AI models generalize to new molecular datasets. Project website.
entry.summary: SPECTRA is an approach for holistic evaluation of how AI models generalize to new molecular datasets. Project website.

entry.title: Kaneb Fellowship Award
entry.content: The lab receives the John and Virginia Kaneb Fellowship Award at Harvard Medical School to enhance research progress in the lab.
entry.summary: The lab receives the John and Virginia Kaneb Fellowship Award at Harvard Medical School to enhance research progress in the lab.

entry.title: NSF CAREER Award
entry.content: The lab receives the NSF CAREER Award for our research in geometric deep learning to facilitate algorithmic and scientific advances in therapeutics.
entry.summary: The lab receives the NSF CAREER Award for our research in geometric deep learning to facilitate algorithmic and scientific advances in therapeutics.

entry.title: Dean’s Innovation Award in AI
entry.content: The lab receives Dean’s Innovation Award for the Use of Artificial Intelligence in Research. HMS News Story.
entry.summary: The lab receives Dean’s Innovation Award for the Use of Artificial Intelligence in Research. HMS News Story.

entry.title: AI’s Prospects in Nature Machine Intelligence

link.title: AI's Prospects in Nature Machine Intelligence

entry.content: We discussed AI’s 2024 prospects with Nature Machine Intelligence, covering LLM progress, multimodal AI, multi-task agents, and how to bridge the digital divide across communities and world regions.
entry.summary: We discussed AI’s 2024 prospects with Nature Machine Intelligence, covering LLM progress, multimodal AI, multi-task agents, and how to bridge the digital divide across communities and world regions.
